mapper.insert: INSERT INTO additional_option (option_name, option_price, max_quantity) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{maxQuantity});
mapper.select: SELECT O.* FROM ( SELECT option_id AS id, option_name AS name, option_price AS price, max_quantity AS maxQuantity FROM additional_option ORDER BY option_id ) O LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT option_id AS id, option_name AS name, option_price AS price, max_quantity AS maxQuantity FROM additional_option WHERE option_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
SELECT o.option_id AS id, o.option_name AS name, o.option_price AS price, o.max_quantity AS maxQuantity FROM additional_option o WHERE o.option_id = #{id}
